review.title: “not what i thought”
review.pros: Pros – had heard horror stories, but actually turned out to be an okay place to work for the most part. supportive staff was friendly
review.cons: Cons – changes in management made things become difficult. friends started to leave which made working there even harder due to relationships that were made and then broken
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – support the staff and value the opinion and experience of others. listen to one another and work towards a common goal
